about_the_game:
This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD01.

[INCLUDED CARDS]
4 copies of each card will be available.
・D-TD01/001EN Bandmaster of Blossoming Bonds, Lianorn
・D-TD01/002EN Brilliant Tune, Rektina
・D-TD01/003EN Budding of Pleasant Sounds, Gracia
・D-TD01/004EN Announcing Wind of Spring, Corphie
・D-TD01/005EN Groovy Dragon
・D-TD01/006EN Upbeat Dragon
・D-TD01/008EN Yield Elf
・D-TD01/009EN Lively Rhythm, Biara
・D-TD01/011EN Knight of Pure, Theadore
・D-TD01/012EN Melodia Pomera
・D-TD01/013EN Cymbal Hamster
・D-TD01/014EN Prominent Elf
・D-TD01/015EN Flowery Tone
・D-TD01/016EN Clapping Dragon
・D-TD01/018EN Fun Fun Marching!
・D-SD04/005EN Seizing Slash Mutant, Bruslash
・D-SD04/009EN Hopeful Maiden, Alejandra

1 copy of each card is available.
・D-SD04/010EN Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
detailed_description:
This content includes the deck recipe and the cards of D-TD01.

[INCLUDED CARDS]
4 copies of each card will be available.
・D-TD01/001EN Bandmaster of Blossoming Bonds, Lianorn
・D-TD01/002EN Brilliant Tune, Rektina
・D-TD01/003EN Budding of Pleasant Sounds, Gracia
・D-TD01/004EN Announcing Wind of Spring, Corphie
・D-TD01/005EN Groovy Dragon
・D-TD01/006EN Upbeat Dragon
・D-TD01/008EN Yield Elf
・D-TD01/009EN Lively Rhythm, Biara
・D-TD01/011EN Knight of Pure, Theadore
・D-TD01/012EN Melodia Pomera
・D-TD01/013EN Cymbal Hamster
・D-TD01/014EN Prominent Elf
・D-TD01/015EN Flowery Tone
・D-TD01/016EN Clapping Dragon
・D-TD01/018EN Fun Fun Marching!
・D-SD04/005EN Seizing Slash Mutant, Bruslash
・D-SD04/009EN Hopeful Maiden, Alejandra

1 copy of each card is available.
・D-SD04/010EN Spiritual King of Determination, Olbaria

*If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive the equivalent amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard DD: Additional Deck [D-TD01]: Urara Haneyama -Bandmaster of Blossoming Bonds-

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
